result.execSummary:
The defendant Kurt E. Mueller was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt: Defendant Kurt E. Mueller in court with attorney Robert Franklin Nagel. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin.  DA informs the Court that the parties have an agreement for resolution whereby the Def will plead to dc for dismissal/read-in of battery and dispo of costs only.  Def pleads no contest to count 2.  Court's colloquy on plea.  Finding of guilty.  Costs ordered.  60 dtp  Count 1 dismissed/read in.

Defendant Kurt E. Mueller in court with attorney Robert Franklin Nagel. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Further status requested and set.  Status conference scheduled for March 2, 2016 at 11:00 am.

Defendant Kurt E. Mueller in court with attorney Robert Franklin Nagel. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Atty. N states he hasn't received State's offer yet; asks for additional status.  Court sets 1/13 at 11.  Status conference scheduled for January 13, 2016 at 11:00 am.
Request from DA to reschedule 09/30/15 to 11/04/15.

Attorney Robert Franklin Nagel in court for Defendant Kurt E. Mueller. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Case wasn't on the calendar today but was called at request of Atty. Nagel who appeared this date for another def.  Atty. N has requested moving the 8/26 to same date/time as his other def's case.  Matter moved to 9/30 at 2:30.  Status conference scheduled for September 30, 2015 at 02:30 pm.
Letter from CC, in regards to the no contact order; cc by clerk to DA 8-17-15 per Court directive

Attorney David William Franker appeared by phone means for Defendant Kurt E. Mueller. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Kurt E. Mueller in court.  Atty. F moves to withdraw for hlth reasons.  Court allows Atty. F to withdraw.  Def plans to hire new counsel; does not qualify for SPD.  Court sets Aug. 26 at 3:30 for further status.  Status conference scheduled for August 26, 2015 at 03:30 pm.
Notice of Motion and Defendant's Counsel's Motion to Withdraw (with proposed order)

Defendant Kurt E. Mueller in court with attorney David William Franker. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Formal reading waived.  NG entered.  Status requested and set.  Status conference scheduled for July 1, 2015 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Kurt E. Mueller in court. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Def states that he's talked with Atty. David Franker; Atty. Franker not able to be here today; was contacted last night.  Court resets the adj. initial for May 20th at 10.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 20, 2015 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Kurt E. Mueller in court. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Complaint filed today; has been received by def.  Def waives formal reading.  Court states charge and informs def of possible max. penalties.  Def to contact SPD re eligibility and report back to clerk the determination of SPD.  Adj. to April 15 at 1:30.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 15, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Def reports back to the Court - does not qualify for SPD.
